meanings.definition: A building where education is provided.
meanings.sent1: The small schoolhouses in our town have colorful walls.
meanings.sent2: Children eagerly walk to the schoolhouses every morning.
meanings.sent3: The schoolhouses decided to have a dance party after hours.
meanings.sent4: In the world of knowledge, schoolhouses are the guiding lights.
meanings.sent5: The schoolhouses stood tall, welcoming students with open doors.

meanings.sent1: There are three schoolhouses in the village.
meanings.sent2: The schoolhouses were all painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent3: The schoolhouses gathered for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The schoolhouses lined up neatly, like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: Visiting all the schoolhouses in the area was a fun adventure.
